name: Buddi Bot
description:
Meet Buddi-Bot: the robot companion that uses machine learning to perform household chores and more! Train your new Buddi to perform tasks in a variety of environments.

This game was made by the University of Texas at Austin's SAGA Lab. The Design and production of this game was supported by Good Systems, a research grant challenge at the University of Texas at Austin
